original_text: You must still give the regular burnt offering with the proper grain offering. You must give them with the proper drink offerings. The animals must not have anything wrong with them.
korean_text: 너희는 다 흠 없는 것으로 상번제와 그 소제와 전제 외에 그것들을 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You must still give the regular burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 여전히 정기적인 번제를 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The animals must not have anything wrong with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동물들은 아무런 흠이 없어야 합니다
